description: x coordinate of synapse centroid in EM voxels (x: 4nm, y: 4nm, z: 40nm). From Allen 'ctr_pt_position'.
y coordinate of centroid in EM voxels (x: 4nm, y: 4nm, z: 40nm). From Allen 'ctr_pt_position'.
z coordinate of centroid in EM voxels (x: 4nm, y: 4nm, z: 40nm). From Allen 'ctr_pt_position'
presyn id of neurite protrusion from soma synapse is located on
presyn id of non-branching segment of neurite limb skeleton synapse is located on
presyn broad neurite compartment category for synapse: soma, axon or dendrite
presyn finer neurite compartment category for synapse: inhibitory,basal,apicaltuft,apicalshaft,oblique,apical(not apicaltuft,apicalshaft or oblique)
presyn id of nucleus for segment from the flat segmentation  Equivalent to Allen: 'id'
presyn skeletal walk distance from closest skeletal point of the synapse to soma

presyn spine or bouton category for synapse: no label = soma, head = spine head, neck = spine neck, shaft = not on spine, nohead = on spine but no head/neck distinction made, bouton = on identified axon bouton, nonbouton = not on identified axon bouton
postsyn id of neurite protrusion from soma synapse is located on
postsyn id of non-branching segment of neurite limb skeleton synapse is located on
postsyn broad neurite compartment category for synapse: soma, axon or dendrite
postsyn finer neurite compartment category for synapse: inhibitory,basal,apicaltuft,apicalshaft,oblique,apical(not apicaltuft,apicalshaft or oblique)
postsyn id of nucleus for segment from the flat segmentation  Equivalent to Allen: 'id'
postsyn skeletal walk distance from closest skeletal point of the synapse to soma

postsyn spine or bouton category for synapse: no label = soma, head = spine head, neck = spine neck, shaft = not on spine, nohead = on spine but no head/neck distinction made, bouton = on identified axon bouton, nonbouton = not on identified axon bouton
